bug.short_desc: company name not specified, may cause namespace conflict
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Looks like company name is not specified for the macOS version of Fedora Media Writer.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): https://ausil.fedorapeople.org/FedoraMediaWriter-osx-3.97.1.dmg
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results:
Several files written out for mediawriter contain "yourcompany"
near:~ chris$ find ~/ -name "*mediawriter*" /Users/chris//Library/Application Support/com.apple.sharedfilelist/com.apple.LSSharedFileList.ApplicationRecentDocuments/com.yourcompany.mediawriter.sfl /Users/chris//Library/Application Support/CrashReporter/mediawriter_A9D64CE6-71F9-5004-813E-60DED8EB4925.plist /Users/chris//Library/Preferences/com.yourcompany.mediawriter.mediawriter.plist /Users/chris//Library/Saved Application State/com.yourcompany.mediawriter.savedState
Expected results:
Probably should be something other than a generic/missing name.
Additional info:
mediawriter-4.0.0-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-10ffb404a4

mediawriter-4.0.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-10ffb404a4
mediawriter-4.0.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
mediawriter-4.0.4-0.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-239cdfbfd6

mediawriter-4.0.4-0.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-239cdfbfd6
mediawriter-4.0.4-0.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
mediawriter-4.0.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
